title: Çigköftem - Kölner Strasse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Turkish fast food franchise offering primarily a vegan vegetable pate made of grains, walnut, tomato puree, sunflower oil, parsley, and green onion which are formed into little balls or fingers and place inside wraps or on mixed plates. Main product is vegan kéfte.
